history.narrative: Law 20-63, the “Cottage Food Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-168. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 1, 2013, and November 5, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 26, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-219 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-63 became effective on January 25, 2014.
